author: aniketkhanal
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47472. It adds a new analyzer to BTV HLT DQM and also adds UParT tagger scores histograms. 

#### PR validation:

The changes pass all the suggested CMSSW PR tests. And the new histograms are visible for workflow 16834.0.
title: [15_0_X] New BTV Monitor
